# isFinished

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates the progress object is complete.

## Declaration

```swift
var isFinished: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

A progress object finishes when the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Progress/completedUnitCount] equals or exceeds the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Progress/totalUnitCount].

By default, [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Progress] is KVO-compliant for this property. It sends notifications on the same thread that updates the property.

## Observing Progress

- **isIndeterminate**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the tracked progress is indeterminate.
- **fractionCompleted**: The fraction of the overall work that the progress object completes, including work from its suboperations.
